betterquesting:10.desc:8:
These sealed jars can be used to store rifts, using the rift encapsulators and releasers to collect and release them. 

This is done by placing the jar some distance under the rift (not right next to it, it may be destroyed by the rift), placing the rift encapsulator on top of the jar, and right clicking on it with the mage gauntlet to encapsulate it into the jar, note that this rift will also distort the nearby creatures when it disappears completely, so make sure to run as originally as you can during the operation! 

The release process is similar to the encapsulation process, place the rift in the tank underground where you want the rift to appear, place the rift release meter above it, and then right-click on it with the mage gauntlet to release it. 

The Cylinder Rift can also be used as a trash can by using a funnel to pass it into the trash, but don't throw the Cylinder Rift into the Rift or another Cylinder Rift, because then... will explode and spawn a genesis sprite!
betterquesting:10.name:8: Fixed release of fissures - fissure jars
